name: The Archer (tomsmile:))
description:
Hello everyone!

This is the first game I have made that I can (barely) call a game!

Play as Archer Lad and shoot baddies with arrows to defend your castle! Defend against infinite waves with cutting-edge technology: your arrows deal more damage the faster they go (wooow)!

Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate the menus, and E, enter, or space to select options. See the "How To Play" menu to learn how to play!

In-game fonts by Daniel Linssen (https://managore.itch.io/). All "art" by me :)

Known Issues so far:

  • Arrow hit detection in groups is very bad most of the time :/
  • Bow charging animation loops back to first frame sometimes

Future Directions:

I'll add some menu art and sound to the game eventually, and maybe add some extra enemies and mechanics, but I think I'll probably end up working on other projects.
